content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property the court declared that there was a debt owed to l bank for a housing credit agreement that both parties were responsible for the court dissolved the marriage and awarded each party with a 50 share of the apartment additionally one party was awarded a motor vehicle worth eur 6000 and the other party was awarded a vehicle worth eur 1000 the court ordered one party to pay the other eur 2000 as compensation for the more expensive vehicle both parties were also ordered to pay legal fees and stamp duty the court considered the best interests of the minor children in making decisions regarding custody access and division of property

metadata.cost: 225.00 EUR (legal fees) + 113.00 EUR(stamp duty) to be borne by the defendant + 826.00 EUR (legal fees) + 3.54 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the applicant
metadata.financial_support: 300 EUR per month for the maintenance of her daughter E.J. and 350 EUR per month for the maintenance of her son J.J.
